Context:
For queries about the General Arts and Sciences (GAS) programs (specifically R101 and R104), contact gas@georgebrown.ca. For inquiries about General Education and Liberal Studies electives, contact laselectives@georgebrown.ca or use the Virtual Service Desk.

Contact George Brown College via phone at 416-415-2000 or TTY at 1-877-515-5559. For email inquiries, use ask.george@georgebrown.ca.

Visit the college's Social Media Hub for more information.

Learn about land acknowledgment from the website.

Sign up to receive updates on application deadlines, college news, upcoming events, tours, and more.

The email addresses provided are gas@georgebrown.ca and laselectives@georgebrown.ca.

For students seeking information about fee requirements, it is their responsibility to verify this information with the college.
